title: Standing Tall
actors: Catherine Deneuve, Rod Paradot, Beno√Æt Magimel, Sara Forestier
plot: Malony has been in conflict with the school and with the law since he was six. But Florence Blaque, a juvenile judge, and Yann, a special educator, are convinced that they can save him from the spiral of revolt and violence in which he seems to be caught for the rest of his days. Will they attain their end in spite of everything, in spite of Malony himself who is his own worst enemy ?
